head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HELFMAN, IRVING L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HELFMAN, IRVING L.

block.p: HELFMAN-Irving L. On August 7, 2000. Loving husband of Annette. Cherished father of Michelle Shaked, and Dr. Alan S., their spouses Ary and Joan. Adored grandfather of Max, Lia & Jordan. Loving brother of Arthur, Mildred & the late Leila. Funeral services 2PM Wednesday, Brettschneider Funeral Home, 98-60 Queens Boulevard, Forest Hills, New York. For information call 212-254-3818.
